title: How AI could help fight burnout

content:

title: Tech Pledges From Trump’s UK Visit Will Test Strained Power Grid
description: Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI are among the US firms that have in recent days pledged to invest £31 billion ($41.8 billion) into artificial intelligence projects in Britain, but industry experts say the commitment could be undermined by the UK’s aging power grid and some of the world’s highest electricity prices.

title: Goa to set up Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence (AI) hospitality
description: Goa to set up Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence (AI) hospitality
content:

title: Some of the biggest businesses we’ve built might not be as relevant going forward: Satya Nadella
description: Satya Nadella, the CEO of Microsoft, expressed concerns about the company's future. He fears Microsoft might fail to adapt to artificial intelligence. Nadella cited Digital Equipment Corporation as a warning. He acknowledged the need to improve Microsoft's work culture. Nadella wants to rebuild trust with employees. The company is committed to creating a better work environment.

title: Students’ complicated relationship with AI: ‘Avoiding using it probably put me at a bit of a disadvantage’
